name: 1001 Arabian Nights
tuning: D# G# C# F# A# D#

content.text:
Chipz – 1001 Arabian Nights tab
Chords will be relative to EADGBE tuning, but tune the real guitar down 1/2 step

Order: I I-H V1 PC1 C H V2 PC2 C H B C2 C2F


[INTRO]
[ch]E[/ch] Phrygian Dominant


[INTRO HOOK] (later versions may repeat “1-0-0-1” at the first D chord)
[ch]Em[/ch]
Oh oh ee yeah yeah
Oh oh ee oh
                  [ch]D[/ch]
Oh oh ee yeah yeah
[ch]Em[/ch]
Oh oh ee yeah yeah
Oh oh ee oh
                  [ch]D[/ch]   n.c.
Oh oh ee yeah yeah


[VERSE 1]
[ch]G[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]Em[/ch]
  Come join this trip (this trip)
                       [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]
  Have you ever seen a world like this
[ch]G[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]
  No shade, just sand 
  [ch]Em[/ch]                                 [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]
  Through the stormy desert we will cross the land


[PRE-CHORUS 1]
[ch]Em[/ch]                                [ch]Am[/ch]
Pharaohs, Cairo, pyramids, Egypt, Bombay, New Delhi
[ch]C[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]
Open sesame


[CHORUS]
[ch]G[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
1-0-0-1 nights
        [ch]Em[/ch]
Arabian nights
              [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
It's a journey of a lifetime
[ch]G[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
1-0-0-1 nights 
        [ch]Em[/ch]
Arabian nights 
                [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
Get ready for a magic carpet ride 


[HOOK]**
[ch]Em[/ch]
Oh oh ee yeah yeah
Oh oh ee oh
Oh oh ee yeah yeah
[ch]D[/ch]
1-0-0-1
[ch]Em[/ch]
Oh oh ee yeah yeah
Oh oh ee oh
Oh oh ee yeah yeah
[ch]D[/ch]


[VERSE 2]
[ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]
We fly through flames
                           [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]
Hear the creatures calling out your name
       [ch]D[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]
We have no fear
                           [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]
Fight the demons make them disappear


[PRE-CHORUS 2]
[ch]Em[/ch]                                  [ch]Am[/ch]
Heroes, vagabonds, city of secrets, land of mystery
[ch]C[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]   (D)
Open sesame


[CHORUS]
[ch]G[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
1-0-0-1 nights
        [ch]Em[/ch]
Arabian nights
        [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
It's a journey of a lifetime

        [ch]Em[/ch]

        [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]

Oh oh ee yeah yeah...
1-0-0-1


[CHORUS 2]

        [ch]F#m[/ch]
Arabian nights
        [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]E[/ch]
It's a journey of a lifetime

        [ch]F#m[/ch]
Arabian nights 
        [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]E[/ch]

[CHORUS 2 - FINAL]
[ch]A[/ch]       [ch]E[/ch]
1-0-0-1 nights
        [ch]F#m[/ch]
Arabian nights
        [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]E[/ch]
It's a journey of a lifetime
[ch]A[/ch]       [ch]E[/ch]

        [ch]F#m[/ch]

                [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]E[/ch]       [ch]F#m[/ch]
Get ready for a magic carpet ride
                [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]E[/ch]       [ch]F#m[/ch]
Get ready for a magic carpet ride

**For the final two hooks, the medial D function is not nearly as strong.
The bass stays on the E as a pedal point.
